title.newValue: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Data purge capabilities for Microsoft Teams content (US Government clouds)

description.newValue:
,Extend data purge functionality to Microsoft Teams content to facilitate purge of sensitive or misplaced data. To track feature availability in other U.S. Government clouds, roadmap item 93368 added to the public roadmap.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/search-and-delete-teams-chat-messages?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: December CY2022
Preview date: September CY2022
